question: Which of the following is used to handle asynchronous operations in JavaScript?
What will `typeof NaN` return in JavaScript?
Which method is used to combine two or more arrays in JavaScript?
What is the default value of a variable declared with `let` but not initialized?
Which of the following is true about arrow functions in JavaScript?
options: They do not have their own `this`
They can be used as constructors
They must always have curly braces
answer: They do not have their own `this`
